TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed TagMapInfo extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElement
Public NotInheritable Class TagMapInfo Inherits ConfigurationElement

summary.span: 包含單一組態標記重新對應的陳述式。

span.span: Contains a single configuration tag remapping statement.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您在編譯時期重新對應的標記類型。The class allows you to remap the types of tags at compile time. 此重新對應會使對應的型別，用於取代原始的標記型別之所有頁面和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。This remapping causes the mapped type to be used in place of the original tag type for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file. 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`tagMapping`小節的`pages`組態檔區段。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `tagMapping` subsection of the `pages` section of a configuration file. 內`tagMappings`子區段，您可以加入和移除指定型別的完整格式的強式名稱的標記類型之間的對應。Within the `tagMappings` subsection, you can add and remove mappings between tag types by specifying the fully qualified strong names of the types. > [!NOTE] > 不同於其他屬性和集合的`pages` 區段中，重新對應標記有不相符的 ASP.NET 網頁指示詞。Unlike other attributes and collections in the `pages` section, tag remapping has no matching ASP.NET page directive. ## Examples 下列組態檔摘錄示範如何以宣告方式指定的數個屬性的值類別。The following configuration file excerpt shows how to declaratively specify values for several properties of the class. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別以程式設計方式修改標記對應設定。The following code example shows how to use the class to programmatically modify tag-mapping settings. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/CS/usingpagessection.cs#17)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection#17](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.PagesSection/VB/usingpagessection.vb#17)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ MappedTagType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定標記要重新對應之型別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the type to which the tag is remapped.

value.span: 標記要重新對應之型別的名稱。

span.span: The name of the type to which the tag is remapped.
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會發生編譯時期標記重新對應。Tag remapping occurs at compile time. 此重新對應會使對應的型別 (所指定屬性) 來取代原始的標記型別 (所指定屬性) 所有的網頁和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。This remapping causes the mapped type (specified by the property) to be used in place of the original tag type (specified by the property) for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 空字串值，這個屬性會導致組態系統，將物件序列化時所擲回例外狀況。An empty string value for this property will cause the configuration system to throw an exception when the object is serialized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 它是一個較大範例的一部分型別。It is part of a larger example for the type.

public: property System::String ^ TagType { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定要重新對應之標記的原始型別的名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the original type for the tag that is being remapped.

value.span: 要重新對應之標記的原始型別名稱。

span.span: The name of the original type for the tag that is being remapped.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會發生編譯時期標記重新對應。Tag remapping occurs at compile time. 此重新對應會使對應的型別 (所指定屬性) 來取代原始的標記型別 (所指定屬性) 所有的網頁和 ASP.NET 中的應用程式組態檔的範圍中的控制項。This remapping causes the mapped type (specified by the property) to be used in place of the original tag type (specified by the property) for all pages and controls in the ASP.NET application in the scope of the configuration file. > [!NOTE] > 空字串值，這個屬性會導致組態系統，將物件序列化時所擲回例外狀況。An empty string value for this property will cause the configuration system to throw an exception when the object is serialized. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
